<topcClas>Specific diseases and medical conditions - Health</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p><i>National Child Development Study: Sweeps 1-6, 1958-2000, Self-Reported Measures</i> includes derived variables that were developed as part of a research study examining risk and preventive factors for chronic fatigue syndrome/myalgic encephalomyelitis (CFS/ME) and irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) in the <i>National Child Development Study</i> (NCDS) (available from the UK Data Archive under GN 33004). Data on the outcome measures was assessed in 1999-2000 during Sweep 6 of data collection, at which point the cohort members were aged 42 years. The study examines a number of life course risk markers for CFS/ME and IBS including childhood adversity, childhood illness, physical activity and psychopathology in childhood and adulthood. <br> <br> The data can be linked to the main NCDS data. Users are advised to also consult the main NCDS documentation which is available for individual Sweeps of the NCDS under 33004.<br> </abstract>       <abstract><B>Main Topics</B>:<br>The study includes the following measures:<ul><li>self-reported measures of CFS/ME and IBS</li><li>a derived measure of CFS-like illness</li><li>measures of childhood illness and symptoms reported at 7, 11 and 16 years</li><li>self-reported physical activity in childhood and adulthood</li></ul></abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd event="start" date="1958-01-01T00:00:00Z">1958</timePrd>         <timePrd event="end" date="2000-01-01T00:00:00Z">2000</timePrd>         <collDate event="start" date="2008-06-01T00:00:00Z">June 2008</collDate>         <collDate event="end" date="2010-05-01T00:00:00Z">May 2010</collDate>         <nation>Great Britain</nation>         <geogUnit>No spatial unit</geogUnit>         <anlyUnit>Individuals</anlyUnit>         <universe>National</universe>         <universe>Respondents to main NCDS in Great Britain, Sweeps 1-6, 1958-2000.</universe>         <dataKind>Numeric data</dataKind>         <dataKind> Individual (micro) level</dataKind>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Longitudinal/panel/cohort</timeMeth>         <timeMeth>The NCDS is an ongoing study. This study includes data from Sweeps 1-6 and outcome measures collected at Sweep 6.</timeMeth>         <sampProc>No sampling (total universe)</sampProc>         <deviat>18,558  cases</deviat>         <collMode>Compilation or synthesis of existing material</collMode>         <sources>           <dataSrc>This study uses data from Sweeps 1-6 of the NCDS (available from the UK Data Archive under GN 33004).</dataSrc>         </sources>         <weight>No weighting used</weight>         <cleanOps>A</cleanOps>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac>UK Data Service</accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Special conditions of access</specPerm>         <restrctn>The depositor has specified that registration is required and standard conditions of use apply. The depositor may be informed about usage.<br/>Additional special conditions of use also apply.
